title: r/Prorevenge How I Brought Down a Crime Ring!
description:
r/Prorevenge In today's episode, OP has to deal with an incredibly obnoxious boss who tries to exploit OP for free work. OP eventually gets tired of his boss's terrible behavior, so he calls him out on it, and from there things quickly escalate. OP ends up reporting his boss to the authorities, who quickly find out that the boss is committing multiple crimes! If you like this podcast and want to see more, follow my podcast for daily Reddit content!
